Class DeckofCards

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.deck.DeckofCards
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeckofCardsInterface

    public class DeckofCards
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeckofCardsInterface
    Represents a deck of cards.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeckofCards

        public DeckofCards(int size,
           Card[] baseDeck)
        Creates new DeckofCards from a standard base deck. Builds new deck by randomly choosing cards from the base deck. Based deck created in Board.java method initCards() method. Precondition: size is smaller than baseDeck.length
        Parameters:
        size - size of deck
        baseDeck - deck from which this deck is build from

    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles deck using 500 exchanges of random cards. Resets number dealt to 0.
        Specified by:
        shuffle in interface DeckofCardsInterface

      • cardsLeft

        public int cardsLeft()
        Returns number of cards left in the deck.

        Returns:
        Integer representing number of cards left in deck.

      • dealCard

        public Card dealCard()
        Deals a card from the deck, shuffles deck if no more cards left to be dealt.
        Specified by:
        dealCard in interface DeckofCardsInterface
        Returns:
        Card representing the top most card in the deck.
